Wireless Bluetooth Headphones - Model XZ500

Experience premium audio quality with our latest wireless headphones. These over-ear headphones feature active noise cancellation technology that blocks out ambient noise for an immersive listening experience.

Key Features:
Forty hour battery life on a single charge
Quick charge capability provides three hours of playback from just ten minutes of charging
Comfortable memory foam ear cushions
Foldable design for easy portability
Built-in microphone for hands-free calls

The headphones connect seamlessly to any Bluetooth enabled device and can remember up to eight paired devices. Premium drivers deliver rich bass and crystal clear highs across all music genres.

Available in black, silver, and midnight blue. One year manufacturer warranty included.
